tha-ap197:0.3_0: Held together and went to the senior monks.
tha-ap197:1.4_0: the Buddha went to the Buddha.
tha-ap197:2.1_0: At a time of a bowl,
tha-ap197:2.2_0: with a great sage, a sage.
tha-ap197:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap197:4.2_0: and have been sentenced to the gods.
tha-ap197:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap197:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṅkiya.
tha-ap197:7.1_0: and a senior by wearing them.
